pages.text: indeed this is a noble Quran
in a concealed book
none touch it except the purified ones
a sending down from the Master of Human kind
Do you take this saying lightly
and you make it your livelihood to deny it
So why not when it (life) reaches the throat
and you are watching at that moment
while We are closer to him than you but you do not see
then if you are not obligated, why don't
you return it (the soul to the body), if you are truthful
But if he is one of the close ones (to God)
then ease and comfort and gardens of delight (are for him)
And if he is among associates of the right hand (the fortunate)
then peace (and well-being) for you among associates of the right hand
And if he is among the misguided deniers
then entertainment of boiling water
and entering (and burning in) hellfire (is for him)
And this is indeed the sure truth
So glorify the name of your great Master
Everything in the skies and the earth glorifies God, and He is the powerful, the wise
Rule of the skies and the earth belongs to Him, He gives life and causes death, and He is capable of everything
He is the first and the last, and the obvious and the obscure, and He knows everything
